meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the Avinger Independent School District is to prepare our students to lead successful lives in an ever changing world. All students must have the knowledge, skills and competencies necessary to interact positively and successfully in a democratic society.

div.class: custom_88166 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated bounceIn
custom_34021 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated bounceIn
div.p: Gov. Greg Abbott, said Friday, April 17,2020, that public schools should remain closed for the rest of the academic year.
Avinger ISD will continue to conduct remote instruction and homework packets.
Next homework packets are due Friday, May 1, 2020.
You may drop off packets at the school between 8:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.
Future packet information will be disclosed later upon guidance from the Texas Education Agency.

p.span: To reduce the risk of spreading the Co-vid 19 virus ,we ask if are ill or feeling sick ,please do not come to the school. While at the school please social distance yourself 6 feet from others.
For more information check our website or facebook page.

span.strong: Annual Title I & Parent/Family Engagement Meeting 2019-2020

p.em: Note: Both meetings will present the same information
Monday, October 21, 2019 at 5:00 pm in the Avinger School Cafeteria

hr.p: Tuesday, October 22, 2019 at 8:00 am in the Counseling Office
​Introduction to Title I and Parent Engagement

p.i: -Parental Involvement Policy and the School-Parent Compact improvement

hr.p: Avinger ISD is currently seeking children to patricipate in our
To be eligible, a child must be 5 years of age as of September 1, 2019.
Note: If you live outside of the Avinger ISD boundaries, you may apply for transfer.
Call 903 562-1355 or come by our office for more information

p.span: Parents if you have a few minutes please fill out our Parent Survey at this link:
